>
[Sanguine Klar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1859)
</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Klar](/Shields.aspx?ID=12)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [wounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) [klar](/Shields.aspx?ID=12)_ (Hardness 8, HP 64, BT 32) is built with spikes made of beasts' fangs.

<document level="2" id="action-1557" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

>
Sanguine Klar (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

A _greater sanguine klar_ (Hardness 13, HP 100, and BT 50) is a _+2 greater striking wounding klar_, and its activation can be triggered by bleed damage at a range of 30 feet.
name: Sanguine Klar (Greater)
